product.name: Dress
product.brief_description: YOINS Women Sleeveless Halter Dress Floral Print Flounced Hem Sexy Bodycon Midi Dresses Party Cocktail Business
product.p1: YOINS women sleeveless halter dress with flounced hem design is elegant, sexy and stylish, show your figure, make you more beautiful and charming.
product.p2: Feature: Floral printed, Bodycon fit, Sleeveless, Halter, Flounced hem, Zip back design, Knee length, Sexy style midi dress for women ladies.
product.p9: Occasions:Suitable for many occasions, like business, banquet, party, cocktail, evening, club, office etc.
product.p10: Material: This cold shoulder party dress is made of Polyester. Soft and comfortable to wear. Hand wash is recommended.
product.p11: Note: Please choose your size according to our SIZE CHART shown in the Product Pictures before ordering. Size may be 1 inch/ 2cm inaccuracy due to hand measure. Color may be light different due to monitor.
